A Canadian, Uncle Sam, and Osama Bin Laden are walking around and 
stumble onto a jar.  A genie pops out of the jar and says he will 
grant three wishes, one for each of them.

First the Canadian steps up to the genie.  "I am a farmer, my father 
was a farmer, and his father before me.  I wish the soil in Canada to 
always be fertile."

The genie nodded, and POOF the Canadian was sent home, Canada now 
being a fertile land for all of eternity.

Then Osama Bin Laden stepped up.  "I wish there was a great wall 
surrounding Afghanistan to keep the infidels out."

The genie nodded and POOF Osama was sent to Afghanistan, sure enough 
a wall was there.

Now Uncle Sam approached the genie.  Being the civil engineer he is 
he questioned the genie.  "Well, about that wall around Afghanistan.  
Describe it."

"Very well," the genie replied.  "The wall is 15,000 feet high and 
500 feet thick.  It is impenatrable, no one can leave Afghanistan or 
enter it."

"Good, good." the American said smiling.  "Fill it completely with 
water."
